actions.committee: House Committee on Foreign Affairs (Subsequently: International Relations)
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs (Subsequently: International Relations).

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the disapproval of the Congress pursuant to section 36(b) of the Foreign Military Sales Act, concerning a U. S. Army offer to sell certain defense articles and services to Turkey.

summary.text: Expresses the disapproval of the Congress, pursuant to the Foreign Military Sales Act with regard to the United States Army offer to sell defense articles and services valuing $229,911,933 to Turkey.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the disapproval of the Congress pursuant to section 36(b) of the Foreign Military Sales Act, concerning a U. S. Army offer to sell certain defense articles and services to Turkey.
